Federal Palace Hotel bụ ụlọ nkwari akụ kpakpando ise nwere ọnụ ụlọ 150 nke na-elepụ anya n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic, nke dị na ebe azụmahịa nke Victoria Island na Lagos. E guzobere ya na 1960 dị ka ụlọ nkwari akụ mba ụwa kachasị na mba ahụ, ọ bụ Victoria Beach Hotel nwe ya, dịka akụkụ nke otu azụmaahịa AG Leventis. A na-ewere ya dị ka "ihe ịrịba ama nke obodo Lagos", họtel ahụ bụ ihe a ma ama maka ịbụ ebe a na-etinye aka na nkwupụta nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa. Ọ bụ ihe onwunwe Sun International kemgbe afọ 2007.
Ụlọ nkwari akụ Federal Palace bụ nke Sun International

Sun International nke a maara nke ọma maka Sun City Resort na North West Province, Rustenburg malitere na 1969, mgbe e mepụtara Southern Sun Hotel Company na South African Breweries na Sol Kerzner na-esonyere ndị agha.
Mgbe Naịjirịa nwetara nwere onwe ya n'aka Britain n'afọ 1960, ọ bụ n'ime ụlọ nzukọ nke Federal Palace Hotel e wuru ọhụrụ ka a bịanyere aka na nkwupụta nwere onwe Naịjiria
Ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ a bụ ugbu a otu n'ime isi ihe ndị dị na cha cha nke họtel ahụ

Ememe nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa mere na Independence Hall nke họtel ahụ, nke, kwa na 1977, kwadoro nzukọ nke ndị isi ala nke African Union (nke bụbu Organisation of Africa Unity) na Festival of African Arts and Culture (FESTAC).
